DestinationDetails.description: A laid-back coastal town celebrated for its crystal-clear waters, vibrant coral reefs, and world-class diving sites. Known for its relaxed and welcoming atmosphere, the town attracts travelers seeking both adventure and tranquility. Its dive spots offer rich marine life, colorful coral gardens, and excellent visibility, making it a favorite destination for scuba divers and snorkelers of all levels.  Beyond the sea, the town features a charming mix of beachfront caf√©s, small resorts, and local markets, creating an easygoing lifestyle that encourages visitors to slow down and enjoy the surroundings. Whether exploring underwater wonders, relaxing on sandy beaches, or watching the sunset over the water, this beach town offers a perfect balance of natural beauty and peaceful escape.
DestinationDetails.name: Dahab
DestinationDetails.shortDescription: A laid-back beach town known for its diving spots and relaxed atmosphere
